name: Ophio's Origin
description:
Ophio is a faithful companion and a gentle soul in a world where the remnants of the past haunt even the most impenetrable mind.

This is the beginning of their story.

This is the world of 'No Mad Nomads'.

___

'Ophio's Origin' is paired with a MetaFactory release. The long-sleeve tee with AR (augmented reality) functionality can be purchased separately here:
